text: The University of the Humanities is a public university in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. The Mongolian name is Хүмүүнлэгийн ухааны их сургууль. It has undergraduate and graduate programs. Fields of study include foreign languages, translation, education, journalism, computer science, economics and business. The school is in downtown Ulaanbaatar at Grand Chinggis Khaan Square. The university is accredited by the Mongolian National Council for Education Accreditation. ==References== ==Other websites== * in English Category:Ulaanbaatar Category:Colleges and universities in Asia Category:Organizations based in Mongolia
title: University of the Humanities
